education.name: University of Texas at Dallas - M.S. Information Technology Management

work.summary: Work in infrastructure DevOps and full stack web development roll
highlights: Full stack web developer in platform infrastructure team
Responsible for design and implementation of a dynamic web apps for internal tool box and metrics reporting automation
Maintained legacy systems and repos, resolving bugs and feature requests and performed testing

work.summary: Backend Engineer for a dynnamic web application
highlights: Installed, Migrated, and configured Windows 2008 Server/VMWare ESX environments.
Installed and configured network appliances including Netbox Blue, Watchguard, Sonicwall, Cisco and HP products.
Managed and maintained application infrastructure such as Symantec Backup and Trend Micro AV.
Configured and administered Windows services including IIS, MSSQL, Terminal Services, WDS, WSUS, SCOM and SCCM
Onsite maintenance and troubleshooting of level 2/3 issues.

keywords: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1, Windows Server 2000/2003/2008/2011, Windows SBS 2003/2008/2011
Debian Linux and flavours including Ubuntu, Backtrack
Microsoft IIS Server, Microsoft SQL Server 2003/2008/2011, Terminal Services, WDS, WSUS, SCOM, SCCM
Apache, MySQL, FTP and SSH servers
Symantec Products including Backup exec and Endpoint Protection
A large range of accounting software such as MYOB, APS, BGL, Handisoft and Quicken
Python 2/3, PHP, Java/Javascript, SQL, C/C++, BASH, VBS, PowerShell, .NET
